## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> wrapper in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> hierarchy.

A member of the <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></em> hierarchy to represent a reference to metadata. This allows, e.g., intrinsics to have metadata as operands.

Notably, this is the only thing in either hierarchy that is allowed to reference <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/localasmetadata">LocalAsMetadata</a></em>.

Definition at line 180 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
